name: Druidic
description: You know the Druidic language and can speak with plants and animals. You can use this language to communicate with plants and animals as if they were a human.

name: Timeless Body
description: For every 10 years that pass, your body only ages by 1 year.

name: Beast Spells
description: You can cast spells while Wildshaped. You can perform the somatic and verbal components of spells, but you aren't able to provide material components.

name: Archdruid
description: You can use your Wild Shape an unlimited number of times.
